definition: to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: He flung himself resolutely into the tangle of undergrowth.
sentences.chinese: 他果斷地鑽進了纏手絆腳的荊棘叢。
